tool_description: A API showing the climate of various places which helps to create a very nice looking UI
name: Climate
title: Climate

api_list.name: Get a single climate news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate26.p.rapidapi.com/news/timesofindia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate26.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate26.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate26.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
